#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
//#include<conio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int test_case;
    cin>>test_case;
    while(test_case--)
    {
         int n;
         cin>>n;
         int c=0;
         if(n%7==0)
         {
                   n/=7;
                   c++;
         }
         if(n%7==0)
         {
                   n/=7;
                   c++;
         }
         if(n%7==0) 
         {
                    c++;
         }
         if(c==2) cout<<"YES\n";
         else cout<<"NO\n";
    }
   // getch();
    return 0;
}
